titles.title: Promote Work and Improve Health Act of 2022
Promote Work and Improve Health Act of 2022

To amend the Public Health Service Act to require a State receiving a block grant for prevention and treatment of substance use disorders to describe the State's efforts to encourage and promote work and employment to improve mental health and well-being.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Promote Work and Improve Health Act of 2022
This bill requires states to describe their efforts to improve mental health and well-being through promoting work and employment as part of their plans for providing mental health services under the Community Mental Health Block Grant program.
